textBeforeTable: See also Template:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list stateTemplate:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list convertedTemplate:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list to bytesTemplate:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list from bytesTemplate:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list ~wstring convertTemplate:cpp/locale/wstring convert/dcl list wstring convert Member functions wide_string::traits_type::int_type int_type Codecvt::state_type state_type std::basic_string<Elem, char_traits<Elem>, Wide_alloc> wide_string std::basic_string<char, char_traits<char>, Byte_alloc> byte_string Definition Member type Member types Class template std::wstring_convert performs conversions between byte string std::string and wide string std::basic_string<Elem>, using an individual code conversion facet Codecvt. std::wstring_convert assumes ownership of the conversion facet, and cannot use a facet managed by a locale. The standard facets suitable for use with std::wstring_convert are
